name: The Box Sorting Extravaganza (LD37)
description:
A game about a warehouse worker getting swamped by boxes on one of the longest days of their life.

CONTROLLS:

move - WASD/Arrow keys/Controller left stick

pickup - E/Space/Left Shift/Left Alt/Left Ctrl/Controller face Buttons

There were plans to make this a co-op game but lack of time/controllers prevented that, if this gets popular I can make it timebased and add multiplayer support
